One the of fantastic movie I ever watched ...Must  be nominated for oscar ...The movie is legendary , acting of Mr sanjay dutt and cast was fabulous .. the theme of story is somewhat similar to sir Munsi premchand novel "godan" and "poos ki raat" based on same issues like poverty , social rasicm , torture from higher caste people and the hardships faced by poor but kind hearted people ... at last main bus itna kehna chahunga ki " jitna kahu iss movie k barein mein utna kam hai " dekho aur please love sanju baba he's really a nice person in real life too aur please (vastav, khalnayak aur  pita ) yeh teeno movie dekh hi lo .
It's one of the forgotten and hidden gem. Sanju and Nandita Das at their finest here. It's brutal and very very emotional. Might be low budget but you should not miss it. It's a must watch.
It's wonderful movie. Both Sanju and Nandita gave justice to the roles. I think such kind of incidents might be happening some parts of our nation.
This movie is amazing. So all the way from canada, lots of respect, especial for Sunday Dutt 👌🏿🙏🏿👍🏿❤️
Really  great  movie  one of the best movie of Sanjay  sir with munna Bahi mbbs  and vastav
